message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. It's fair and we both walk away happy.
Alice, considering the inflation on my side, I think this split would be more fair. I still want to be reasonable, so I'm not asking for too much more.
Bob, since you're feeling the pinch of inflation, I'm willing to adjust my offer. This split is closer to your last proposal but still fair to both of us. Let's end this on a good note.
